abstract: K2 Intelligence, the investigative business started by Jules Kroll and Jeremy Kroll, has acquired Thacher Associates, a leading player in the niche business of overseeing large-scale real estate development projects on behalf of governments and developers to ferret out corruption in the construction process.

headline.main: Krolls’ K2 Firm Buys a Corporate Watchdog
